page.title: 18LOCAL HISTORY STOKE ON TERN
page.content: {THE SHROPSHIRE GIANT { The Shropshire Giant was a big man. In fact he was 7ft 3ins tall and could walk at a speed of 8 miles an hour.His weight was 23 stones. People used to call him the Shropshire Giant because of his enormous size. He was born in 1853 over 132 years ago and named Tom Dutton. He led an interesting life. Part of it was spent travelling abroad with a circus where he was billed as the Amazing Soldier and wore a Roman style uniform. For much of his life he had had to support his Mother, but eventually he married Betsy Allmark. They had 7 children. Tom helped to build Stoke on Tern School and Church. He was able to carry the massive blocks of sandstone single-handed. He was a very gentle man.He lies in Stoke on Tern cemetry.
